column13: Tailings recycling at Northern Star involves managing mine tailings, which are the byproducts of ore processing. column6: Management of significant waste-related impacts
column13: Dry stack facilities at Northern Star are specialised storage areas for mine tailings designed to minimise the environmental impact of waste disposal. Unlike traditional wet tailings storage, dry stack facilities involve dewatering the tailings before they are placed in a designated area.

column6: Management of significant waste-related impacts
column13: Underground tailings backfill at Northern Star disposes of mine tailings by placing them back into mined-out underground voids. This approach optimises waste management by reducing the surface footprint and minimising the environmental impact of traditional tailings disposal methods.
column20: Underground tailings backfill, paste fill, fines and liquid
